Plot: Based on the true story of Valerie Solanas who was a 60s radical preaching hatred toward men in her "Scum" manifesto. She wrote a screenplay for a film that she wanted Andy Warhol to ...
Title: I Shot Andy Warhol
Writer: Jeremiah Newton (book), Diane Tucker (research), Mary Harron, Daniel Minahan
Actors: Lili Taylor, Jared Harris, Martha Plimpton, Lothaire Bluteau
